thread.title: Uber Exposed The Personal Information Of Hundreds Of Drivers

title: Uber Exposed The Personal Information Of Hundreds Of Drivers
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
Uber failed to protect the personal information of its drivers and exposed the Social Security numbers, tax information and drivers license ...
